knowledge.question: Given the above code, what is the output if *Text is printed?
explanation: Incorrect: if text were printed instead of *text, then this would be correct
Correct: text is a character pointer and dereferencing text *text will print a single character
Incorrect: *text is a dereference and will print content not an address
Incorrect: First, the pointer has been advanced 2 chars past the beginning of the array, second *text is a dereference to a char and will only print a singe char
